name: DeltaCross Combatants (Demo)
description:
DeltaCross Combatants is a 3D Beat-Em-Up with heavy RPG influences.  This demo is far from complete but I wanted to get it in front of players now in order to gain much needed feedback.  Any and all feedback is appreciated!

Donations are certainly welcome but your feedback is much more valuable.

Controls

Movement - Keyboard Arrow Keys

Z - Punch

X - Kick

C - Block

V - Grab/Throw

Shift - Sprint

Punch + Kick - Special Attack

Be sure to check out the MoveList while in the game!

Partial Joypad support is also supported and can be configured from the Settings Menu from the title screen.
